00046 Entree& Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose_VEF::readOn(Entree& s )
00047 {
00048   s >> le_champ_front;
00049   le_champ_ext.typer("Champ_front_uniforme");
00050   le_champ_ext.valeurs().resize(1,dimension);
00051   return s;
00052 }

00062 
00063 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose_VEF::flux_impose(int face) const
00064 {
00065   if (le_champ_front.valeurs().size()==1)
00066     {
00067       double a1 = trace_pression_int[face];
00068       double a2 = coeff[face];
00069       double a3 = le_champ_front(0,0);
00070       double Pimp  = a1 + a2*a3;
00071       return Pimp ;
00072     }
00073   else if (le_champ_front.valeurs().line_size()==1)
00074     {
00075       return (trace_pression_int[face] + coeff[face]*le_champ_front(face,0));
00076     }
00077   else
00078     Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose_VEF::flux_impose erreur" << finl;
00079   exit();
00080   return 0.;
00081 }
00082 
00083 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose_VEF::flux_impose(int  , int ) const
00084 {
00085   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose_VEF::flux_impose(int  , int )" << finl;
00086   Cerr << "On ne sait imposer que la composante normale du gradient" << finl;
00087   return 0.;
00088 }
00089 
00090 int Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose_VEF::
00091 compatible_avec_eqn(const Equation_base& eqn) const
00092 {
00093   Motcle dom_app=eqn.domaine_application();
00094   Motcle Hydraulique="Hydraulique";
00095   Motcle indetermine="indetermine";
00096   if ( (dom_app==Hydraulique) || (dom_app==indetermine) )
00097     return 1;
00098   else
00099     {
00100       err_pas_compatible(eqn);
00101       return 0;
00102     }
00103 }
